alias.Elder Gods (Greek mythology):
The Children of Cronus/Kronos The Olympians
Zeus's Siblings

headquarters.Elder Gods (Greek mythology):
Mt. Olympus (all but Hades) The Underworld (Hades)
The Ocean (Poseidon)
Garden of the Hesperides (Hera's private garden)

affiliation.Elder Gods (Greek mythology):
Zeus - Chaotic Good Hera - True Neutral
Poseidon - Chaotic Evil
Demeter - Chaotic Neutral
Hades - Lawful Neutral
Hestia - Lawful Good

'''Collectively''' Omnipotent (On a cosmic level)
Immortal
Voyeurism
Extreme Endurance
True forms melt mortals
Shape-Shifting

Weather Manipulation
Lighting bolts
Tremendous strength

Aquakinesis

Global Flora control
Regional Weather Control

Invisibility
Thanokinesis
Shadow Control
Omniscience

Master stealth skills

Pyrokinesis
Healing abilities
Superb cooking skills
Unmatched Charisma
Strong will-power
Plasmakinesis (Star control)

goals.Elder Gods (Greek mythology):
To Free his siblings from Cronus's stomach(Zeus)To escape Cronus's stomach(all but Zeus)
Defeat the Titans
Maintain order for the cosomos
Indulge their vices (All but Hades and Hestia)
